name: OUYA Gaming Source
blurb: A one-stop destination for OUYA game news. Every week, we carry the best content from our website into our video series: OUYA Radar.

rewards.reward: No Reward

★★★ SUPPORTER:   
  
  An official backer badge icon next to your name on OUYAgamingsource.com ★            
       
 Your name or gamertag listed on the official contribution wall on the website ★  

 A personal thank you tweeted from OUYA Gaming Source. ★ 

(This is included with all donations)
\u2605\u2605\u2605 SPECIAL EDITION ANIMATED RADAR STICKER: A special edition 4"x4" animated "holographic" OUYA Radar sticker. (Add $7 to any order to get a sticker with any other tier!)

\u2605\u2605\u2605 BETA ACCESS TO FESTIVAL OF MAGIC: Early beta-access to Festival of Magic RPG for OUYA: http://snowcastlegames.com/games/fom/. (Add $10 to any order to get the Festival of Magic beta with any other tier!)

\u2605\u2605\u2605 GLOW IN THE DARK RADAR T-SHIRT  - EARLY BIRD SPECIAL PRICE: This is special early bird pricing for early pledges of the special edition T-shirt with glow-in-the-dark OUYA Radar logo. (Add $20 to any order to get a T-shirt with any other tier!)
\u2605\u2605\u2605 GLOW IN THE DARK RADAR T-SHIRT: A special edition T-shirt with glow-in-the-dark OUYA Radar logo. (Add $20 to any order to get a T-shirt with any other tier!)

\u2605\u2605\u2605 GLOW IN THE DARK RADAR HOODIE - EARLY BIRD SPECIAL PRICE: This is special early bird pricing for early pledges of the special edition lightweight pullover hooded sweatshirt with glow-in-the-dark OUYA Radar logo. (Add $40 to any order to get a hoodie with any other tier!)

\u2605\u2605\u2605 GLOW IN THE DARK RADAR HOODIE:  A special edition lightweight pullover hooded sweatshirt with glow-in-the-dark OUYA Radar logo. (Add $50 to any order to get a hoodie with any other tier!)
\u2605\u2605\u2605 5-SECOND GRAPHIC INTRO: We will animate a 5 second graphics-based intro with sound effects edited for your vlog or video series (must supply your own logo).

\u2605\u2605\u2605 BRONZE WEBPAGE SPONSOR (2nd term placement):\r\nSince we have exceeded our goal, we are adding 4 more of these tiers. This is for placement on the month of your choice between August and December. Medium Rectangle ad on our website. Supply us with your 300 x 250 ad to be placed on OUYAgamingsource.com with clickable link back to your website for a 1-month duration.

\u2605\u2605\u2605 BRONZE WEBPAGE SPONSOR:  Medium Rectangle ad on our website. Supply us with your 300 x 250 ad to be placed on OUYAgamingsource.com with clickable link back to your website for a 1-month duration.

\u2605\u2605\u2605 SILVER WEBPAGE SPONSOR (2nd term placement): Since we have exceeded our goal, we are adding 2 more of these ads. This is for placement on the month of your choice between August and December. : Halfpage ad placement on our website. Supply us with your 300 x 600 ad to be placed on OUYAgamingsource.com with clickable link back to your website for a 1-month duration.

\u2605\u2605\u2605 SILVER WEBPAGE SPONSOR: Halfpage ad placement on our website. Supply us with your 300 x 600 ad to be placed on OUYAgamingsource.com with clickable link back to your website for a 1-month duration.
\u2605\u2605\u2605 LOGO DESIGN: An originally created logo created for your game company or brand, specially designed by artist Lauren Nash: http://transientart.deviantart.com

\u2605\u2605\u2605 ORIGINAL DESIGNED BANNER AD: An originally created banner ad based on your game company logo or brand, specially designed by artist Lauren Nash: http://transientart.deviantart.com (this is for the banner design only, placement on website on next tier)

\u2605\u2605\u2605 GOLD WEBSITE SPONSOR WITH WEBSITE PLACEMENT: \r\nYour 300 x 600 size ad, specially designed by artist Lauren Nash: http://transientart.deviantart.com \u2605PLUS\u2605 placed on OUYAgamingsource.com with clickable link for a 1-month duration.

\u2605\u2605\u2605 OUYA RADAR VIDEO SPONSOR: Pre-roll placement before one video on our OUYA Radar series for cross-promotion. (must be limited to 5 seconds as a preroll ad). You supply us with your own video or graphic for 5 second placement, with our host saying "this video is sponsored by *your name*" before the start of one video of the OUYA Radar series.

\u2605\u2605\u2605 GRAPHICS-BASED VIDEO PRODUCED: Bryan Robbins will produce a graphics-only based video for you, edited with your consultation to advertise your game project, video series, or even a promo video for your own Kickstarter project. This includes pre-visualization and consultation, royalty-free music, sfx, and editing.

\u2605\u2605\u2605 PLATINUM WEBPAGE SPONSOR - SPECIAL RATE FOR ONE BACKER ONLY: Re-skin of our website with your designed background. Your background including the branding of your game or company will take over our website's outer skin area on every page for a one-month duration.

\u2605\u2605\u2605 GRAPHICS-BASED VIDEO PRODUCED WITH PREROLL PLACEMENT: Bryan Robbins will produce a graphics-only based video for you, edited with your consultation to advertise your game project, video series, or even a promo video for your own Kickstarter project. This includes pre-visualization and consultation, royalty-free music, sfx, and editing \u2605PLUS\u2605 Pre-roll placement before one video on our OUYA Radar series for cross-promotion. (must be limited to 5 seconds as a preroll ad on OUYA radar, but we can produce a full extended-cut version and 5-second version for preroll placement).

\u2605\u2605\u2605 PLATINUM WEBPAGE SPONSOR: Re-skin of our website with your designed background: Send us your background including the branding of your game or company, and it will take over our website's outer skin area on every page for a one-month duration.

\u2605\u2605\u2605 PLATINUM WEBPAGE SPONSOR WITH CUSTOM PRODUCED DESIGN: Re-skin of our website with a custom designed background created by Lauren Nash: A webpage skin custom made by Lauren with your consultation, including the branding of your game or company will take over our website's outer skin area on every page for a one-month duration.

★★★ FULLY PRODUCED PROMO VIDEO FOR YOUR COMPANY, GAME OR KICKSTARTER PROJECT - SPECIAL RATE FOR ONE BACKER ONLY!!!:
We're lowering our top tier to a very low rate for one backer only. From preproduction, shoot, design, graphics, editing to completion, with you as our client (you can be local to LA, fly to LA at your expense for the shoot, or work remotely with us through email/phone/Skype), we will produce a video for anyone who needs a Kickstarter video, promo, game trailer, you name it; we'll promote this video on one of our OUYA Radar videos, and develop a marketing strategy for your video campaign to maximize your views and subscribers. DETAILS:
FULLY PRODUCED VIDEO WITH PREROLL PLACEMENT - We will produce a high-quality live-action video promo (including graphics) to advertise your video for your own Kickstarter project; your video will be produced by Bryan Robbins (http://www.spotlessfilms.com/) from pre-to-post with film crew, and shot in a studio environment with a greenscreen cyclorama, backdrop, or varied location depending on what's needed for your concept. This includes pre-visualization and consultation, writing, casting/ talent, original logos and graphics created by designer Lauren Nash, royalty-free music, sfx, editing, color-correction ★PLUS★ Pre-roll placement before one video on our OUYA Radar series for cross-promotion. (must be limited to 5 seconds as a preroll ad on OUYA radar, but we can produce a full extended-cut version and 5-second version for preroll placement). ★PLUS★ Marketing strategy consultation on how to promote your video when you're ready to launch your Kickstarter project or promo video to maximize viewership, take advantage of SEO tactics to get the video discovered more easily, cross-promote other videos and gain more subscribers.

This video will take approximately 3-4 weeks to produce with your reviews and approval process, and will be ready to launch when you're ready for it to go live. Please contact us for further details.

\u2605\u2605\u2605 FULLY PRODUCED VIDEO: We will fully produce a high-quality live-action video promo (including graphics) to advertise your game project, video series, or even a promo video for your own Kickstarter project; your video will be produced by Bryan Robbins from pre to post and shot in a studio environment with a greenscreen cyc or backdrop depending on what's needed for your concept. This includes pre-visualization and consultation, writing, casting/ talent, original logos and graphics created by designer Lauren Nash, royalty-free music, sfx, editing, color-correction.

\u2605\u2605\u2605 FULLY PRODUCED VIDEO WITH PREROLL PLACEMENT: We will fully produce a high-quality live-action video promo (including graphics) to advertise your game project, video series, or even a promo video for your own Kickstarter project; your video will be produced by Bryan Robbins from pre to post and shot in a studio environment with a greenscreen cyc or backdrop depending on what's needed for your concept. This includes pre-visualization and consultation, writing, casting/ talent, original logos and graphics created by designer Lauren Nash, royalty-free music, sfx, editing, color-correction \u2605PLUS\u2605 Pre-roll placement before one video on our OUYA Radar series for cross-promotion. (must be limited to 5 seconds as a preroll ad on OUYA radar, but we can produce a full extended-cut version and 5-second version for preroll placement).
